attributes.action:
To stop the doors being chopped 
In our Scottish schools
attributes.additional_details:
Due to health and safety regulations 
The doors need to remain for fire safety reasons
attributes.background: Put a stop to this happening in scottish schools.

rejection.details:
In any case your petition could be about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.parliament.scot/
